author: ash🕺🏽
text: At that point in the semester when I can only afford to eat 1.5 meals a day😭

author: ash🕺🏽
text: It truly angers me that certain black men have taken the “angry black woman” stereotype created under white supremacist ideology and used it not only to abandon, but to BASH the women of their own race in the name of their ‘preference’
